content.json:
## Mitre Evaluation Workbook
Review the latest 2020 Mitre Evaluation here [Mitre Evaluation](https://attackevals.mitre-engenuity.org/enterprise/participants/?rounds=carbanak_fin7) 

MITRE Engenuity does not assign scores, rankings, or ratings. The evaluation results are available to the public, so other organizations may provide their own analysis and interpretation - these are not endorsed or validated by MITRE Engenuity.

parameters.name: Evaluation
parameters.query:
let mitre = adx("https://teachjing.westus.kusto.windows.net/securitydata").mitreeval;
mitre
| extend Adversaries = (todynamic(Aggregate_Data))['Evaluation_Aggregate_Data']['Adversaries']
| mv-expand Adversaries
| evaluate bag_unpack(Adversaries)
| distinct Display_Name

parameters.name: Vendor
parameters.query:
let mitre = adx("https://teachjing.westus.kusto.windows.net/securitydata").mitreeval;
mitre
| distinct Participant_Name
| sort by Participant_Name asc

parameters.name: SelectedScenario
parameters.label: Scenario
parameters.query:
let mitre = adx("https://teachjing.westus.kusto.windows.net/securitydata").mitreeval;
mitre
| mv-expand Adversaries
| where Adversaries['Display_Name'] == "{Evaluation}"
| where Participant_Name == "Microsoft"
| mv-expand Scenarios = Adversaries['Detections_By_Step']
| mv-apply Scenarios on (
    extend Scenario = tostring(bag_keys(Scenarios)[0])
    | extend Steps = Scenarios[Scenario]['Steps']
)
| distinct Scenario

content.query:
let mitre = adx("https://teachjing.westus.kusto.windows.net/securitydata").mitreeval;
mitre
| extend Adversaries = (todynamic(Aggregate_Data))['Evaluation_Aggregate_Data']['Adversaries']
| mv-expand Adversaries
| evaluate bag_unpack(Adversaries)
| where Display_Name == "{Evaluation}"
| project Participant_Name, Display_Name, Linux_Participant, Total_Detections, Analytic_Detections, Telemetry_Detections, Visibility
| extend Link = "https://attackevals.mitre-engenuity.org/enterprise/participants/microsoft/results.html?adversary=carbanak_fin7"
| sort by Total_Detections
content.title: Select Vendor here and proceed to the next tab

formatOptions.linkLabel: Click here to review Mitre Evaluation

content.query:
let mitre = adx("https://teachjing.westus.kusto.windows.net/securitydata").mitreeval;
mitre
| extend Adversaries = (todynamic(Aggregate_Data))['Evaluation_Aggregate_Data']['Adversaries']
| mv-expand Adversaries
| evaluate bag_unpack(Adversaries)
| where Adversary_Name == "carbanak_fin7"
| project Participant_Name, Display_Name, Total_Detections
| sort by Total_Detections
content.title: Total Detections Result

content.query:
let mitre = adx("https://teachjing.westus.kusto.windows.net/securitydata").mitreeval;
mitre
| extend Adversaries = (todynamic(Aggregate_Data))['Evaluation_Aggregate_Data']['Adversaries']
| mv-expand Adversaries
| evaluate bag_unpack(Adversaries)
| where Adversary_Name == "carbanak_fin7"
| project Participant_Name, Display_Name, Linux_Participant, Total_Detections, Analytic_Detections, Telemetry_Detections, Visibility
| sort by Total_Detections
content.title: Telemetry + Analytic Detections

content.query:
let mitre = adx("https://teachjing.westus.kusto.windows.net/securitydata").mitreeval;
mitre
| project Participant_Name, Adversaries
| mv-expand Adversaries
| where Adversaries['Adversary_Name'] == "carbanak_fin7"
| where Participant_Name == "{Vendor}"
| mv-expand Scenarios = Adversaries['Detections_By_Step']
| mv-apply Scenarios on (
    extend Scenario = tostring(bag_keys(Scenarios)[0])
    | extend Steps = Scenarios[Scenario]['Steps']
)
| where Scenario == "{SelectedScenario}"
| mv-expand Steps
| project-away Adversaries, Scenarios
| evaluate bag_unpack(Steps)
| extend totalsteps = array_length(Substeps)
| project Step = Step_Num, Step_Name, Total_Steps = totalsteps

let mitre = adx("https://teachjing.westus.kusto.windows.net/securitydata").mitreeval;
mitre
| project Participant_Name, Adversaries
| mv-expand Adversaries
| where Adversaries['Adversary_Name'] == "carbanak_fin7"
| where Participant_Name == "Microsoft"
| mv-expand Scenarios = Adversaries['Detections_By_Step']
| mv-apply Scenarios on (
    extend Scenario = tostring(bag_keys(Scenarios)[0])
    | extend Steps = Scenarios[Scenario]['Steps']
)
| where Scenario == "{SelectedScenario}"
| mv-expand Steps
| project-away Adversaries, Scenarios
| evaluate bag_unpack(Steps)
| extend totalsteps = array_length(Substeps)
| where Step_Name == "{SelectedStep}"
| mv-expand Substeps
| evaluate bag_unpack(Substeps)
| evaluate bag_unpack(Tactic)
| evaluate bag_unpack(Technique)
| evaluate bag_unpack(Subtechnique)
| evaluate bag_unpack(Detections)
| project Step_Name, Substep, Criteria, Detections, Tactic_Id, Tactic_Name, Technique_Id, Technique_Name, Subtechnique_Id, Subtechnique_Name
content.title: Sub Steps
content.noDataMessage: Please select a parent step to view corresponding sub steps

content.query:
let mitreeval = adx("https://teachjing.westus.kusto.windows.net/securitydata").mitreeval;
let Protections = mitreeval
| project Participant_Name, Adversaries | mv-expand Adversaries
| where 
    Adversaries.Display_Name == "{Evaluation}" 
    and isnotempty(Adversaries.Protections)
    and Participant_Name == "{Vendor}"
| project 
    Participant_Name, 
    Adversary_Name = Adversaries.Adversary_Name, 
    Protections = Adversaries.Protections
| mv-expand Protections = Protections.Protection_Tests | evaluate bag_unpack(Protections)
| mv-expand Substeps
| evaluate bag_unpack(Substeps);
let blocked = Protections
| distinct Test_Num
| join kind=leftouter (Protections | where Protection_Type == "Blocked") on Test_Num
| project Test_Num, Result = iff(Protection_Type =="Blocked", "Blocked", "Executed Successfully");
Protections | join kind=leftouter blocked on Test_Num
| evaluate pivot(Result)
| extend ["Executed Successfully"] = column_ifexists("Executed Successfully", 0)
| summarize Blocked = sum(Blocked), Executed = sum(['Executed Successfully']) by tostring(Tactic.Tactic_Name)
content.title: Protection Results by Tactic

content.query:
let mitreeval = adx("https://teachjing.westus.kusto.windows.net/securitydata").mitreeval;
let Protections = mitreeval
| project Participant_Name, Adversaries | mv-expand Adversaries
| where 
    Adversaries.Display_Name == "{Evaluation}" 
    and isnotempty(Adversaries.Protections)
    and Participant_Name == "{Vendor}"
| project 
    Participant_Name, 
    Adversary_Name = Adversaries.Adversary_Name, 
    Protections = Adversaries.Protections
| mv-expand Protections = Protections.Protection_Tests | evaluate bag_unpack(Protections)
| mv-expand Substeps
| evaluate bag_unpack(Substeps);
let blocked = Protections
| distinct Test_Num
| join kind=leftouter (Protections | where Protection_Type == "Blocked") on Test_Num
| project Test_Num, Result = iff(Protection_Type =="Blocked", "Blocked", "Executed Successfully");
Protections | join kind=leftouter blocked on Test_Num
| evaluate pivot(Result)
| extend ["Executed Successfully"] = column_ifexists("Executed Successfully", 0)
| summarize Blocked = sum(Blocked), Executed = sum(['Executed Successfully']) by tostring(Tactic.Tactic_Name)
content.title: Protection Results by Tactic

content.query:
let mitreeval = adx("https://teachjing.westus.kusto.windows.net/securitydata").mitreeval;
let Protections = mitreeval
| project Participant_Name, Adversaries | mv-expand Adversaries
| where 
    Adversaries.Display_Name == "{Evaluation}" 
    and isnotempty(Adversaries.Protections)
    and Participant_Name == "{Vendor}"
| project 
    Participant_Name, 
    Adversary_Name = Adversaries.Adversary_Name, 
    Protections = Adversaries.Protections
| mv-expand Protections = Protections.Protection_Tests | evaluate bag_unpack(Protections)
| mv-expand Substeps
| evaluate bag_unpack(Substeps);
let blocked = Protections
| distinct Test_Num
| join kind=leftouter (Protections | where Protection_Type == "Blocked") on Test_Num
| project Test_Num, Result = iff(Protection_Type =="Blocked", "Blocked", "Techniques Executed successfully");
Protections | join kind=leftouter blocked on Test_Num
| where Result != "Blocked"
| project Test_Group, Test_Num, Test_Name, Test_Description, Criteria, Protection_Type, Result
| sort by Test_Num
content.title: Techniques where {Vendor} failed to protect against

content.query:
let mitreeval = adx("https://teachjing.westus.kusto.windows.net/securitydata").mitreeval;
let Protections = mitreeval
| project Participant_Name, Adversaries | mv-expand Adversaries
| where 
    Adversaries.Adversary_Name == "carbanak_fin7" 
    and isnotempty(Adversaries.Protections)
    and Participant_Name == "Cisco"
| project 
    Participant_Name, 
    Adversary_Name = Adversaries.Adversary_Name, 
    Protections = Adversaries.Protections
| mv-expand Protections = Protections.Protection_Tests | evaluate bag_unpack(Protections)
| mv-expand Substeps
| evaluate bag_unpack(Substeps);
let blocked = Protections
| distinct Test_Num
| join kind=leftouter (Protections | where Protection_Type == "Blocked") on Test_Num
| project Test_Num, Result = iff(Protection_Type =="Blocked", "Blocked", "Techniques Executed successfully");
Protections | join kind=leftouter blocked on Test_Num
| summarize countif(Result != "Blocked") by tostring(Tactic.Tactic_Name)
| where countif_ != 0
content.title: Tactics that Executed Successfully
